General.Name: Angold Resources Ltd
General.Description: Angold Resources Ltd., a junior exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada, the United States, and Chile. Its flagship property is the 100% owned the Iron Butte property covering an area of approximately 1,540 hectares consists of 190 claims located in the Battle Mountain, Nevada. Angold Resources Ltd. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 918-1030 W Georgia St, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2Y3
